name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom Serene Garden Haven new tab page

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: customized new tab page with a stunning nature-themed background

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Offers a customized new tab page with a stunning nature-themed background, designed to provide a browsing experience that is both convenient and relaxing. Featuring a misty village and serene garden, this extension includes:

Custom Search Bar: Located at the top left corner, the search bar allows quick and easy access to your preferred search engine.
Favorite Website Shortcuts: Add shortcuts to your most-visited websites for quick, one-click access.
Time Display: A clear clock display helps you manage your time directly from your new tab page.
